content.raw:
I'm getting some compiler errors:

~~~
/home/louisep/code/gsoc_gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc: In member function ‘void gazebo::physics::World::Load(sdf::ElementPtr)’:
/home/louisep/code/gsoc_gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc:263:47: error: ‘service’ was not declared in this scope
     gzerr << "Error advertising service [" << service << "]"
                                               ^
/home/louisep/code/gsoc_gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc: In member function ‘void gazebo::physics::World::PluginInfoService(const ignition::msgs::StringMsg&, ignition::msgs::Plugin_V&, bool&)’:
/home/louisep/code/gsoc_gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc:2983:14: error: ‘_pluginUri’ was not declared in this scope
     else if (_pluginUri.Str().find("/plugin"))
              ^
~~~
